errorMessage == '' || errorMessage =~ '(Reporter exceeded usage limits|Inca error)'

suite.name: remote-compute.teragrid.org-4.2.0
suite.description: The Remote Compute kit defines a secure capability that allows scientists to remotely submit and manage compute jobs.
